name: sequencingidentifier
label: Sequencing identifier
description: A unique proper name or character sequence that identifies this particular nucleic acid sequencing assay. (NCIT:C171337)

name: belongstosample
label: Belongs to sample
description: Reference to the prepared sample, i.e. the source that was sequenced. (NCIT:C25683)

name: sequencingdate
label: Sequencing date
description: Date on which this sequencing assay was performed. (GENEPIO:0000069)

name: sequencingplatform
label: Sequencing platform
description: The used sequencing platform (i.e. brand, name of a company that produces sequencer equipment). (GENEPIO:0000071)

name: sequencinginstrumentmodel
label: Sequencing instrument model
description: The used product name and model number of a manufacturer's genomic (dna) sequencer. (GENEPIO:0001921)

name: sequencingmethod
label: Sequencing method
description: Method used to determine the order of bases in a nucleic acid sequence. (FIX:0000704)

name: averagereaddepth
label: Average read depth
description: The average number of times a particular locus (site, nucleotide, amplicon, region) was sequenced. (NCIT:C155320)

name: observedreadlength
label: Observed read length
description: The number of nucleotides successfully ordered from each side of a nucleic acid fragment obtained after the completion of a sequencing process. (NCIT:C153362)

name: observedinsertsize
label: Observed insert size
description: In paired-end sequencing, the DNA between the adapter sequences is the insert. The length of this sequence is known as the insert size, not to be confused with the inner distance between reads. So, fragment length equals read adapter length (2x) plus insert size, and insert size equals read lenght (2x) plus inner distance. (FG:0000002)

name: percentageq30
label: Percentage Q30
description: Percentage of reads with a Phred quality score over 30, which indicates less than a 1/1000 chance that the base was called incorrectly. (GENEPIO:0000089)

name: percentagetr20
label: Percentage TR20
description: Percentage of the target sequence on which 20 or more unique reads were successfully mapped. (FG:0000003)

name: otherqualitymetrics
label: Other quality metrics
description: Other NGS quality control metrics, including but not limited to (i) sequencer metrics such as yield, error rate, density (K/mm2), cluster PF (%) and phas/prephas (%), (ii) alignment metrics such as QM insert size, GC content, QM duplicated reads (%), QM error rate, uniformity/evenness of coverage and maternal cell contamination, and (iii) variant call metrics such as number of SNVs/CNVs/SVs called, number of missense/nonsense variants, common variants (%), unique variants (%), gender match and trio inheritance check. (EDAM:data_3914)
